title: Associate Rulestacks to NGFW
description: Cloud NGFW for AWS supports local and global rulestacks. The Local Account Administrator manages local rulestacks. The AWS Firewall Manager Administrator manages the global rulestacks across the NGFWs in different AWS accounts within the AWS organization.
